word:
"There is that scattereth, and yet increaseth; and there is that withholdeth more than is meet, but it tendeth to 
                                                                           140
poverty." "Cast thy bread upon the waters: for thou shalt find it after many days." "The liberal soul shall be made fat: and he that watereth shall be watered also himself." Proverbs 11:24, 25; Ecclesiastes 11:1.
